_learningOutcomes.outcome: Classify important components of a smart city
Discuss the relationship between smart cities and open data
Give examples of the impact of networks on smart city planning
Recognise 3 principles for planning smart city services
Apply network thinking principles to solve smart city challenges
List 3 building blocks of open smart cities
Produce a basic model for an open city service
Assess a smart city service against the criteria for open cities
Distinguish future business opportunities in smart cities
Prepare a go-to-market strategy for an open city service
Classify organisations in an open city value chain
